feed.title: RustSec Advisories
feed.subtitle: Security advisories filed against Rust crates

entry.title: RUSTSEC-2024-0389: openslide is unmaintained
entry.content:
History ⋅ Edit ⋅ JSON (OSV)

RUSTSEC-2024-0389

openslide is unmaintained
Reported
July 3, 2024
Issued
November 10, 2024
Package
openslide (crates.io)
Type
INFO Unmaintained
References
  • https://github.com/ojskrede/openslide-rust/issues/4
Patched
no patched versions

Description

The openslide crate is no longer maintained.

Last release was on 2018-11-20.

Possible alternatives

Consider using an alternative, for instance:

  • openslide-rs
  • pamly

Advisory available under CC0-1.0 license.

entry.title: RUSTSEC-2024-0390: minitrace is unmaintained
entry.content:
History ⋅ Edit ⋅ JSON (OSV)

RUSTSEC-2024-0390

minitrace is Unmaintained
Reported
August 14, 2024
Issued
November 10, 2024
Package
minitrace (crates.io)
Type
INFO Unmaintained
References
  • https://github.com/tikv/minitrace-rust/issues/229
Patched
no patched versions

Description

The minitrace maintainers have decided to continue the development of minitrace under a new organizational structure to improve community governance.

In the meantime, minitrace will no longer be maintained. For more details, refer to tikv/minitrace-rust#229.

Possible Alternative(s)

fastrace is maintained by the same team responsible for minitrace, and users are encouraged to migrate to fastrace.

Advisory available under CC0-1.0 license.

entry.title: RUSTSEC-2024-0395: chrono-english is unmaintained
entry.summary: The maintainer of chrono-english is unresponsible
entry.content:
History ⋅ Edit ⋅ JSON (OSV)

RUSTSEC-2024-0395

The maintainer of chrono-english is unresponsible
Reported
June 24, 2024
Issued
November 10, 2024
Package
chrono-english (crates.io)
Type
INFO Unmaintained
References
  • https://github.com/stevedonovan/chrono-english/issues/29
Patched
no patched versions

Description

All versions will encounter compilation errors with a chrono version >0.4.35, due to backward incompatible API changes.

User conradludgade reworked the original crate and created a fork with the same API surface called interim.

The fork is better structured and passes the same test suite as chrono-english, ensuring backward compatibility.

Advisory available under CC0-1.0 license.

entry.title: RUSTSEC-2024-0380: pqcrypto-dilithium is unmaintained
entry.content:
History ⋅ Edit ⋅ JSON (OSV)

RUSTSEC-2024-0380

Replaced by pqcrypto-mldsa
Reported
October 24, 2024
Issued
November 10, 2024
Package
pqcrypto-dilithium (crates.io)
Type
INFO Unmaintained
Patched
no patched versions

Description

This crate has been replaced by pqcrypto-mldsa, which provides a FIPS204-compatible implementation of ML-DSA.

Advisory available under CC0-1.0 license.

entry.title: RUSTSEC-2024-0391: Vulnerability in paillier-zk
entry.content:
History ⋅ Edit ⋅ JSON (OSV)

RUSTSEC-2024-0391

Ambiguous challenge derivation
Reported
July 18, 2024
Issued
November 10, 2024
Package
paillier-zk (crates.io)
Type
Vulnerability
Categories
  • crypto-failure
Keywords
#mpc #tss #zkp
References
  • https://github.com/dfns/paillier-zk/pull/49
Patched
  • >=0.4.0

Description

Challenge derivation in non-interactive ZK proofs was ambiguous and that could lead to security vulnerability (however, it's unknown if it could be exploited).

Advisory available under CC0-1.0 license.

entry.title: RUSTSEC-2024-0385: cw0 is unmaintained
entry.content:
History ⋅ Edit ⋅ JSON (OSV)

RUSTSEC-2024-0385

cw0 is unmaintained
Reported
August 26, 2024
Issued
November 10, 2024
Package
cw0 (crates.io)
Type
INFO Unmaintained
References
  • https://github.com/CosmWasm/cw-plus/issues/471
Patched
no patched versions

Description

The crate cw0 was first renamed to utils in 2021 and then to cw-utils because utils was already claimed on crates.io.

The crate cw0 is not maintained anymore since then and should be replaced with cw-utils.

Advisory available under CC0-1.0 license.

Type
INFO Unmaintained
References

Patched
no patched versions

Description

Last release was on 2023-07-30. opentelemetry_api has been moved into the opentelemetry crate.

Please use the opentelemetry crate going forward.

Advisory available under CC0-1.0 license.

entry.content:

November 10, 2024

Type
Vulnerability
Categories
  • crypto-failure
Keywords
#mpc #tss #zkp
References
  • https://github.com/dfns/cggmp21/pull/103
Patched
  • >=0.3.0

Description

Challenge derivation in non-interactive ZK proofs was ambiguous and that could lead to security vulnerability (however, it's unknown if it could be exploited).

Advisory available under CC0-1.0 license.

entry.title: RUSTSEC-2024-0379: Unsoundness in fast-float
entry.content:
History ⋅ Edit ⋅ JSON (OSV)

RUSTSEC-2024-0379

Multiple soundness issues
Reported
October 31, 2024
Issued
November 9, 2024
Package
fast-float (crates.io)
Type
INFO Unsound
References
  • https://github.com/aldanor/fast-float-rust/issues/35
  • https://github.com/aldanor/fast-float-rust/issues/28
  • https://github.com/aldanor/fast-float-rust/issues/37
Patched
no patched versions

Description

fast-float contains multiple soundness issues:

  1. Undefined behavior when checking input length, which has been merged but no package pubished.
  2. Many functions marked as safe with non-local safety guarantees

The library is also unmaintained.

Alternatives

For quickly parsing floating-point numbers third-party crates are generally no longer needed. A fast float parsing algorithm by the author of lexical has been merged into libcore. When requiring direct parsing from bytes and/or partial parsers, the fast-float2 fork of fast-float containing these security patches and reduces overall usage of unsafe.

Advisory available under CC0-1.0 license.
